tasks.title: Download and optimize hero placeholder image
tasks.description: Download high-quality pet/dog image from Unsplash and save to src/assets/images/. Let Astro handle optimization.
acceptance_criteria: Image depicts happy pets or pet shop environment
Image license allows commercial use (Unsplash license)

tasks.title: Create Hero.astro component with basic structure
tasks.description: Create Hero component with props interface, section wrapper, and placeholder content. No styling yet, just structure.
acceptance_criteria: Props interface defined (title, slogan, ctaText, ctaLink, imageUrl, imageAlt)

tasks.title: Implement responsive design and Tailwind styles
tasks.description: Add Tailwind classes for layout, typography, colors, and responsive breakpoints. Include background image with overlay.
acceptance_criteria: Background image displayed with overlay gradient
min-h-screen on mobile, h-[80vh] on desktop

tasks.title: Implement CTA button with styles and accessibility
tasks.description: Style CTA button with brand colors, hover effects, focus states, and proper accessibility attributes.
acceptance_criteria: Hover effect implemented (darker shade or opacity)
Focus ring visible for keyboard navigation
Proper link behavior (scroll to #contacto or WhatsApp)

tasks.title: Integrate Hero component into index.astro
tasks.description: Import and render Hero component in homepage, replacing temporary test content.
acceptance_criteria: Hero rendered as first section in BaseLayout

tasks.title: Verify build and test accessibility
tasks.description: Run production build, test on multiple devices/browsers, verify Lighthouse score and accessibility.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds without errors
Hero visible on all screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Contrast ratio meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 minimum)
Keyboard navigation works (tab to CTA, enter to activate)
Alt text present on hero image
